title: Hedera
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042639/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042639/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Hedera**

Hedera n. Latin, meaning ivy. One of the earliest punctuation marks in Greek and Roman inscriptions and writing. Later it became a [typographic ornament](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042639/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typographic%20ornaments) in book publishing.
author: mica
